Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I refactored each set of tests (faucet/reward/dice/token) to it's own function, so I can re-use the tests against various wallets scenarios: different amounts of funds, p2pk vs p2kpkh, etc. I think it's better than copying tests around to different files that only have slight changes
